rows.label: tlk70000061_03_msg0001
rows.name:
The other day, Rita got lost again.
Nothing bad happened, thank God,
so that's fine at least...

rows.label: tlk70000061_03_msg0002
rows.name:
But then she said how sorry she was
that she was such a useless Driver, and
that I wouldn't get to live for very long.

rows.label: tlk70000061_03_msg0003
rows.name: Naturally, I was furious at her...

rows.label: tlk70000061_03_msg0004
rows.name:
It hurt more than I thought. I didn't
want to make her think she should
be strong just so I can survive.

rows.label: tlk70000061_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Rita means the world to me. Living
a long life has never been one of my
priorities.

rows.label: tlk70000061_03_msg0006
rows.name:
I just wish there were some way to
tell that to her without snapping
every time. This is no good at all...
